title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body:
So i've only gotten this issue quite recently, and it's really bugging me out that i can't play league because of this issue, i don't really know why it is happening, i've already submitted a ticket to Riot, but it seems that their reply is pretty slow, can anyone halp me in this one :<   ... And does anyone experienced this kind of issue before? It'll be such a pleasure to have an answer to this, thank you

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Screenshot
https://imgur.com/p2ISqei

replies.body:
We have a higher volume right now, but a specialist should be reaching out as soon as they can.  In the meantime, your network could be blocking you from reaching the authentication server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with this!

I also recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings.
